body: Emma Barnett, digital media editor at "The Telegraph", summarized reflections from her recent trip to Russia and explained "Why the Russian Internet doesn't need the West." According to Barnett, the Russian Internet industry is "self-contained and self-sufficient" and it has no "ambition for the foreseeable future to expand internationally."

title: Russia: Internet Industry Stays at Home

sentence: Emma Barnett, digital media editor at "The Telegraph", summarized reflections from her recent trip to Russia and explained "Why the Russian Internet doesn't need the West."
According to Barnett, the Russian Internet industry is "self-contained and self-sufficient" and it has no "ambition for the foreseeable future to expand internationally."
